name: EnterococcusFaeciumOrEFaecalisTestsByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Enterococcus faecium or E. faecalis (Tests by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Enterococcus faecium or E. faecalis infection by culture or identification),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Enterococcus faecium or E. faecalis culture),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
